## NAME
=pod

=head1 NAME

DiaColloDB::WWW - www wrappers for DiaColloDB indices, top-level

=cut

##========================================================================
## SYNOPSIS
=pod

=head1 SYNOPSIS

 ##========================================================================
 ## PRELIMINARIES
 
 use DiaColloDB::WWW;

 #... stuff happens

=cut

##========================================================================
## DESCRIPTION
=pod

=head1 DESCRIPTION

The DiaColloDB::WWW package is a convenience module for loading the
various L<DiaColloDB|DiaColloDB> sub-packages. 
See the subclass documentation for details.

=cut

##----------------------------------------------------------------
## DESCRIPTION: DiaColloDB::WWW: Globals & Constants
=pod

=head2 Globals & Constants

=over 4

=item Variable: @ISA

DiaColloDB::WWW inherits from
L<DiaColloDB::Logger>.

=back

=cut

##========================================================================
## END POD DOCUMENTATION, auto-generated by podextract.perl

##----------------------------------------------------------------
## DESCRIPTION: DiaColloDB::WWW: Globals & Constants
=pod

=head1 SUBCLASSES

The following subclasses are included in the DiaColloDB::WWW distribution
and should be loaded by C<use DiaColloDB::WWW>:

=over 4

=item L<DiaColloDB::WWW::CGI|DiaColloDB::WWW::CGI>

(f)cgi wrapper utility class.

=item L<DiaColloDB::WWW::Server|DiaColloDB::WWW::Server>

rudimentary standalone http server using L<HTTP::Daemon|HTTP::Daemon>.

=item L<DiaColloDB::WWW::Handler|DiaColloDB::WWW::Handler>

abstract request handler class API for use with L<DiaColloDB::WWW::Server|DiaColloDB::WWW::Server>.

=item L<DiaColloDB::WWW::Handler::cgi|DiaColloDB::WWW::Handler::cgi>

request handler for template instantiation using L<DiaColloDB::WWW::CGI|DiaColloDB::WWW::CGI>.

=item L<DiaColloDB::WWW::Handler::raw|DiaColloDB::WWW::Handler::raw>

request handler for raw files.

=back

=cut
